response.overview: The exciting and explosive conclusion to the 'Bad Intent' film series features all-out-war; expect brutal betrayals, terrifying twists, cutthroat kills, frightening forces and one of the biggest bloodbaths in film history as the franchise reaches it's end!
response.tagline: I WON'T GIVE YOU LIFE MY CHILD!
response.title: Bad Intent 10: Baddest Intent
